title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 615.1 - Emergency conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 615.1 - Emergency conditions

State Regulations

Reimbursement for costs incurred under emergency or
similar circumstances shall be claimed in accordance with requirements and
directions of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
615.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
